short_summary: Gravel and Sand Supply for CFB Suffield
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Suffield, including the British Army Training Unit Suffield (BATUS), and Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC)-Suffield have the as-and when requested requirement for the supply, delivery and offloading of gravel and sand products to CFB Suffield in Ralston, Alberta, including the Crown Village of Ralston, CFB Suffield (the base) and the CFB Suffield Range.

### Contract Details

	+ UNSPSC Description: Natural aggregate
* Procurement Category: GD
* Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements
The tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
